labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: MacBook Pro (Retina, 15-inch, Mid 2014), macOS High Sierra 10.13.2 Beta (17C79a), Automatic graphics switching [On]
data.client_settings: Discord Canary(7502) / PTB(7503), HW Acceleration [Off], Dev Mode [On]
data.actual_result: Server icon list area and channel list flickers when mouse hovered over. Right part of Textbox disappears breifly.
data.short_description: UI flickers when HW acceleration off [macOS specific problem]
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn off hardware acceleration - Relaunch Discord - Switch between joined servers randomly, hover mouse over different parts of Discord UI, repeatedly
